description: Non-Supine RDI at 3% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 3% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrop3 + hnrop3 + carop3 + canop3 + oarop3 + oanop3 ) / ( remepop + nremepop )

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-Supine RDI at 3% oxygen desaturation
